name: add-style
description: Base Bootstrap file for Auto Data Direct, Inc.

scripts.build: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/style.scss dist/add-style.css
scripts.build-docs: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 docs/style.scss docs/style.css
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch scss --ignore dist/ -e scss -x "npm run build"
